dialogue.raw_text: They're taking the tank. PAN TO 7 Shiites with rifles climb the unmanned Iraqi tank. 4 Iraqi soldiers FIRE back at the Shiites. Troy, naked, tries to break away in the chaos. Iraqi soldiers FIRE on them, but the turret aims at the bunker and FIRES -- blasting a hole. INT. BUNKER - CRUDE CEMENT BATHROOM - DAY Troy is thrown onto the floor of a cluttered cement bathroom with two crude toilets. His clothes are thrown on top of him.
